title: Bug 25458[Font] DBCS support: new SWT API
description: Last Friday we have included a new API in Font:public Font(Device device, FontData[] fds) {In order to have a more appropriate behavior on DBCS platforms Eclipse/UIshould start using this API.Anyway, the best police still is never change the default font in the widget ifyou don't need to.(this new API is going to make difference in Eclipse/Motif only)
